channel.title: Another portfolio
channel.description:
heyo
i just saw that other portfolio topic and thought it'd also be interesting to get some feedback on mine. this environment is very technical and at the same time very creative, which is somewhat what i'd describe my interests as. so it should fit in here.
unfortunately it's all german :S so most of you ppl here won't understand what i say on there. but thats not very important anyway. you'll find the media stuff at "Projekte".
long story short - heres the url:
[url]https://www.henning-tjaden.com[/url]
let me know what you think.
thanks in advace

item.title: Another portfolio
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
Maverix26:

??? Chill, bobbo hasn’t had any experience with html

It’s a pretty good portfolio(: Your work looks really nice!
Edit: Wait, bobbo already told you d:

yo dude i am so chilled bro

Read full topic

item.title: Another portfolio
item.dc:creator: ikoN
item.description:
sersoft:

https://www.henning-tjaden.com/_files/Bilder/evo.png

about the next to last guy, the penis is usually a bit lower

haha yeah, youre not the first one to notice that

thanks for the replies! yeah ive been “taught” doing stuff like this. ive just achieved my bachelor degree in “media computer science”.

ill think about adding the scrollbar permanently but i dont think ill do it. i think that looks more disturbing than having the page jump a little. but thanks for the advice nonetheless!

there is still a little bug on the page. the highlighting of the main navigation doesnt always work correctly. im currently using javascript to swap the images depending on the current page. i do this because im using the same html template for every site. but it seems as if there is a problem if youre hovering it while its still loading up. which should not happen since im using the “domready” function…

if anyone knows how to properly do stuff like this, id be grateful.

Read full topic

item.title: Another portfolio
item.dc:creator: bobbo
item.description:
wheybags:

A lot better than that other one, anyway.

yea… looks like he was taught/shown it too… me on the other hand… no exposure to anything html or any of that at all… thanks

Site looks amazing though! Cool design.

item.title: Another portfolio
item.dc:creator: RabidMonkey
item.description:
When you open the rollout bars/dropdowns for each ‘section’, the page becomes longer than the browser window and a scrollbar appears, knocking the page off-center slightly by a few px - you might want to force the scrollbar to always be visible (if you can, somehow, there are a few ways of doing that if I remember right) so that the page doesn’t shift when you expand everything.

Very nitpicky, though

Read full topic
